cards.name: Abomination
cards.effect: none

cards.name: Adam Warlock
cards.effect: At the end of each turn, if you are winning this location, draw a card.

cards.name: Aero
cards.effect: On Reveal: Move all enemy cards played this turn to this location.

cards.name: Agatha Harkness
cards.effect: Agatha starts in your hand and plays your cards for you.

cards.name: Agent 13
cards.effect: On Reveal: Add a random card to your hand

cards.name: America Chavez
cards.effect: You always draw this card on turn 6, and not before.

cards.name: Angel
cards.effect: When one of your cards is destroyed, this flies out of your deck to replace it.

cards.name: Angela
cards.effect: When you play a card here, +2 Power.

cards.name: Ant-Man
cards.effect: Ongoing: If you have 3 other cards here, +3 Power.

cards.name: Apocalypse
cards.effect: When you discard this from your hand, put it back with +4 Power.

cards.name: Armor
cards.effect: Ongoing: Cards at this location can't be destroyed.

cards.name: Arnim Zola
cards.effect: On Reveal: Destroy a random friendly card here. Add copies of it to the other locations.

cards.name: Baron Mordo
cards.effect: On Reveal: Your opponent draws a card. Set its Cost to 6.

cards.name: Beast
cards.effect: On Reveal: Return your other cards at this location to your hand. They cost 1 less.

cards.name: Bishop
cards.effect: When you play a card, this gains +1 Power.

cards.name: Black Bolt
cards.effect: On Reveal: Your opponent must discard the lowest-Cost card in their hand.

cards.name: Black Cat
cards.effect: If this is in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it.

cards.name: Black Panther
cards.effect: On Reveal: Double this card's Power.

cards.name: Black Widow
cards.effect: On Reveal: Add a Widow's Bite to your opponent's hand

cards.name: Blade
cards.effect: On Reveal: Discard a card from your hand.

cards.name: Blue Marvel
cards.effect: Ongoing: Your other cards have +1 Power.

cards.name: Brood
cards.effect: On Reveal: Add 2 Broodlings to this location with the same Power.

cards.name: Bucky Barnes
cards.effect: When this is destroyed, create the Winter Soldier in its place.

cards.name: Cable
cards.effect: On Reveal: Put the bottom card of your opponent's deck into your hand.

cards.name: Captain America
cards.effect: Ongoing: Your other cards at this location have +1 Power.

cards.name: Captain Marvel
cards.effect: At the end of the game, move to a location that wins you the game. (If possible)

cards.name: Carnage
cards.effect: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards here. +2 Power for each destroyed.

cards.name: Cerebro
cards.effect: Ongoing: Your highest Power cards get +2 Power.

cards.name: Cloak
cards.effect: On Reveal: Next turn, both players can move cards to this location.

cards.name: Colleen Wing
cards.effect: On Reveal: Discard the lowest-cost card from your hand.

cards.name: Colossus
cards.effect: Ongoing: Can't be destroyed, moved, or have its Power reduced.

cards.name: Cosmo
cards.effect: Ongoing: On Reveal abilities won't happen at this location.

cards.name: Crossbones
cards.effect: You can only play this at locations where you are winning.

cards.name: Crystal
cards.effect: On Reveal: If this is at the middle location, shuffle your hand into your deck and draw 3 cards.

cards.name: Cyclops
cards.effect: none

cards.name: Dagger
cards.effect: When this moves to a location, +2 Power for each card your opponent has there.

cards.name: Daredevil
cards.effect: On turn 5, you get to see your opponent's plays before you make your own.

cards.name: Deadpool
cards.effect: When this is destroyed, return it to your hand with double the power.

cards.name: Death
cards.effect: Costs 1 less for each card destroyed this game.

cards.name: Deathlok
cards.effect: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards at this location.

cards.name: Debrii
cards.effect: On Reveal: Add a Rock to each other location, for both players.

cards.name: Destroyer
cards.effect: On Reveal: Destroy your other cards.

cards.name: Devil Dinosaur
cards.effect: Ongoing: +2 Power for each cards in your hand.

cards.name: Doctor Doom

cards.name: Doctor Octopus

cards.effect: On Reveal: Move your highest Power cards to this location.

cards.name: Domino
cards.effect: You always draw this card on turn 2, and not before.

cards.name: Dracula
cards.effect: At the end of the game, discard a  card from your hand. This has its Power.

cards.name: Drax
cards.effect: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +4 Power.

cards.name: Ebony Maw
cards.effect: You can't play this after turn 3. Ongoing: You can't play cards here.

cards.name: Electro
cards.effect: On Reveal: +1 Max Energy. Ongoing: You can only play 1 card a turn.

cards.name: Elektra
cards.effect: On Reveal: Destroy a random enemy 1-Cost card at this location.

cards.name: Enchantress

cards.name: Forge

cards.name: Gambit

cards.name: Gamora

cards.name: Ghost Rider

cards.name: Giganto

cards.name: Goose

cards.effect: On Reveal: If your opponent played a card here this turn, +3 Power.

cards.effect: On Reveal: Your opponent gains control of this.

cards.effect: On Reveal: Swap the Power and Cost of all cards in your deck.
